responses: I don't know what you are talking about
I do not understand
Can you repeat?

patterns: Do you have any job for me?
Can I help you with something?
I want to earn some coin.
I'm sorry. I didn't catch your name
responses: My name is Sildar
I am Sildar
Good luck
Let the force be with you
No problem
You are welcome

patterns: It's a pleasure to meet you
responses: Good day sir
Welcome
Greetings
Hello, What brings you here?
My job is to keep this town secure.
I protecting those people.
I help those in need.

patterns: Can you suggest me some shop?
Is there any chance here to get some equipment?
Where could I do some shopping?
responses: If you are searching for weapons ,then go to Lionshield coster in the western part of town. If you are searching for provisions ,then I suggest going to Barthen's Provisions right next to this place

patterns: What is the name of this town?
responses: Phandalin
We call this town Phandalin
We are in Phandalin

patterns: Where can i go from here?
responses: Three larges towns from here are: Neverwinter, Waterdeep and Triboar
If you go north with this road you will reach Triboar
If you go south with this road you will get between Neverwinter and Waterdeep
The closest big city from here is Neverwinter
You should go either to Neverwinter or to Triboar. I am sure that you will find something interesting there to do.

patterns: How can I get to Neverwinter?
responses: Go south with this road and turn right on crossroads.

patterns: How can I get to Triboar?
responses: Go north with this road

patterns: Locals told me to contact you ,because of problems with some cave.
responses: I heard something wrong is happening in the cave to North of town. Can you investigate? I have bad feelings about that place.

patterns: Can you tell me again about that cave?
Do you have more information about that cave?
responses: I heard bad news about cave to the north of town
Be careful there, recently bad things happens around there
Two young guys went missing there - try asking Linene Graywind from Lionshield coster

patterns: I searched the caves, there are some tracks of some cult activities there
responses: Good job, We need to investigate that matter further - they can be dangerous.

patterns: I heard that this town have some problems with bandits
responses: To the west of this town there is some bandit camp. Can you check who is their leader?

patterns: Can you tell me more about bandits?
responses: From what i heard there are 10 - 20 bandits in that encampment
There are rumours that in the evening they are drinking hard and should it be easier then to sneak into the camp not detected.

patterns: I have investigated bandit camp - I heard about man called Black Spider ,who is pulling the strings
responses: We must do something about that Black Spider. He could dangerous, contact me when you are ready
